title: 11 Designer Jewelry Finds on Amazon That Feel Like Hidden Gems
description: Choosing a new piece of jewelry is a lot like buying a designer handbag. The process involves diligent research in determining what's worth your hard-earned funds and why you're drawn to it. (Because it's trendy? Timeless? A celeb-favorite?) Whatever the case, we're never ones to recommend purchasing something like designer jewelry willy-nilly, which is why we've created this guide to the best designer jewelry you can score on Amazon, including options at all price points, from more affordable designers like Kendra Scott to investment pieces from luxury labels such as Ulla Johnson. Keep scrolling to shop our top selects, including editor-loved favorites like a necklace one of our writers looks forward to wearing daily (and gifting!), a waterproof ring that won't tarnish, cute and covetable earrings and a matching necklace just in time for the holiday gifting season, and so much more. Even better, every piece is available on Amazon Prime with shipping as fast as one day, so your new jewelry can be in hand almost immediately. Related: 25 Jewelry Finds From Amazon That Look Exceptionally Luxe
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We rounded up the best designer jewelry hiding in plain sight on Amazon.

If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Choosing a new piece of jewelry is a lot like buying a designer handbag. The process involves diligent research in determining what's worth your hard-earned funds and why you're drawn to it. (Because it's trendy? Timeless? A celeb-favorite?) Whatever the case, we're never ones to recommend purchasing something like designer jewelry willy-nilly, which is why we've created this guide to the best designer jewelry you can score on Amazon, including options at all price points, from more affordable designers like Kendra Scott to investment pieces from luxury labels such as Ulla Johnson.Keep scrolling to shop our top selects, including editor-loved favorites like a necklace one of our writers looks forward to wearing daily (and gifting!), a waterproof ring that won't tarnish, cute and covetable earrings and a matching necklace just in time for the holiday gifting season, and so much more. Even better, every piece is available on Amazon Prime with shipping as fast as one day, so your new jewelry can be in hand almost immediately.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Pendant NecklaceKendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace ($64, originally $70) This pendant necklace is available in every dreamy gemstone color you could want, has over 10,000 five-star ratings, and earned a PS editor's seal of approval. Even better? It's under $100, which is a rare find in the world of designer jewelry, and its timeless design makes it the perfect gift for anyone on your list (including yourself). Learn more via our Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace review.Editor Quote: "I've found that it looks good with everything. I've worn it with casual everyday attire like a long-sleeved turtleneck or a T-shirt, and dressier ensembles as well. While I haven't delved into my jewelry box to explore potential layering options, I've been inspired by the various combinations showcased on the Kendra Scott Instagram page." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Waterproof RingHey Harper Gold Ring ($68) A common stressor when buying jewelry that's not pure gold or platinum is the worry that it may tarnish. That's one of the many reasons we're obsessed with Hey Harper, a waterproof jewelry brand that promises to stay tarnish-free. This ring is one of the brand's Amazon bestsellers, with one shopper calling it the "perfect everyday ring" in their five-star review.amazon.comBest Compass NecklaceGorjana Women's Compass Coin Pendant Necklace ($68) Gift this necklace to the traveler or adventurer in your life, or keep it for yourself. It's perfect for wearing solo or layering with shorter pieces for a personalized look. There's also a silver-plated option available, and it's fully adjustable, so you can find your perfect fit.amazon.comBest Knot EarringsHeaven Mayhem Baby Knot Silver Earrings ($85) Heaven Mayhem jewelry is a go-to for cool girls, with celebrity fans such as Lori Harvey, Jasmine Tookes, and Hailey Bieber, to name a few. The brand was founded in 2022 and has quickly garnered popularity for its vintage-inspired designs — especially these bestselling lightweight knot earrings that add the perfect finishing touch to any look.amazon.comBest Stacked HoopsJenny Bird Florence Earring ($138) Fashion designer Jenny Bird calls these earrings the brand's "most-talked-about" — and it's easy to see why. They give the illusion of two hoops stacked together, so you only need one piercing per ear (though doubling up with two pairs looks insanely chic). Choose from two finishes: gold or silver.amazon.comBest Pearl EarringsJennifer Behr Women's Iris Earring ($142) The beauty of these stacked pearl earrings (aside from their obvious aesthetic appeal) is that they're incredibly versatile. Wear them with a cozy sweater this fall and winter, or pair them with a gown for that winter wedding on your calendar.amazon.comBest Button EarringsLele Sadoughi Women's Reflection Button Earrings ($145) These earrings have all the charm of a vintage store find with their mesmerizing blue agate resin cabochon and gold-plated setting. The color is undeniably double take-worthy, and the oversize shape is the definition of elegance. amazon.comBest Beachy NecklaceEliou Women's Arla Wrap Necklace ($175) If you've got a vacation on the calendar or your vibe leans eclectic, laid-back, and DIY-inspired, it's time to add some Éliou to your collection. The brand's wrap necklaces are some of our faves. It comes in several iterations, but this spiral freshwater pearl pendant version is hard to beat.amazon.comBest Double Strand NecklaceLizzie Fortunato Lamai Heart Necklace ($380) Lizzie Fortunato jewelry is packed with personality, and this necklace is no exception. The playful double strand design features vibrant multicolor sapphire beads, a gold-plated paperclip chain, and a dangling amazonite heart with a faceted citrine gemstone for a touch of sparkle.amazon.comBest Bubble NecklaceUlla Johnson Women's Bubble Coral Necklace ($450) This Ulla Johnson bubble necklace is a one-of-a-kind piece you'll want to pass down to loved ones someday. It's handmade in Kenya from recycled brass and assembled in New York, featuring playful bubble-shaped vintage coral stones. Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Choosing a new piece of jewelry is a lot like buying a designer handbag. The process involves diligent research in determining what's worth your hard-earned funds and why you're drawn to it. (Because it's trendy? Timeless? A celeb-favorite?) Whatever the case, we're never ones to recommend purchasing something like designer jewelry willy-nilly, which is why we've created this guide to the best designer jewelry you can score on Amazon, including options at all price points, from more affordable designers like Kendra Scott to investment pieces from luxury labels such as Ulla Johnson.

Keep scrolling to shop our top selects, including editor-loved favorites like a necklace one of our writers looks forward to wearing daily (and gifting!), a waterproof ring that won't tarnish, cute and covetable earrings and a matching necklace just in time for the holiday gifting season, and so much more. Even better, every piece is available on Amazon Prime with shipping as fast as one day, so your new jewelry can be in hand almost immediately.

Best Pendant Necklace

Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace ($64, originally $70)

This pendant necklace is available in every dreamy gemstone color you could want, has over 10,000 five-star ratings, and earned a PS editor's seal of approval. Even better? It's under $100, which is a rare find in the world of designer jewelry, and its timeless design makes it the perfect gift for anyone on your list (including yourself). Learn more via our Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace review.

Editor Quote: "I've found that it looks good with everything. I've worn it with casual everyday attire like a long-sleeved turtleneck or a T-shirt, and dressier ensembles as well. While I haven't delved into my jewelry box to explore potential layering options, I've been inspired by the various combinations showcased on the Kendra Scott Instagram page." — Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Waterproof Ring

Hey Harper Gold Ring ($68)

A common stressor when buying jewelry that's not pure gold or platinum is the worry that it may tarnish. That's one of the many reasons we're obsessed with Hey Harper, a waterproof jewelry brand that promises to stay tarnish-free. This ring is one of the brand's Amazon bestsellers, with one shopper calling it the "perfect everyday ring" in their five-star review.

Best Compass Necklace

Gorjana Women's Compass Coin Pendant Necklace ($68)

Gift this necklace to the traveler or adventurer in your life, or keep it for yourself. It's perfect for wearing solo or layering with shorter pieces for a personalized look. There's also a silver-plated option available, and it's fully adjustable, so you can find your perfect fit.

Best Knot Earrings

Heaven Mayhem Baby Knot Silver Earrings ($85)

Heaven Mayhem jewelry is a go-to for cool girls, with celebrity fans such as Lori Harvey, Jasmine Tookes, and Hailey Bieber, to name a few. The brand was founded in 2022 and has quickly garnered popularity for its vintage-inspired designs — especially these bestselling lightweight knot earrings that add the perfect finishing touch to any look.

Best Stacked Hoops

Jenny Bird Florence Earring ($138)

Fashion designer Jenny Bird calls these earrings the brand's "most-talked-about" — and it's easy to see why. They give the illusion of two hoops stacked together, so you only need one piercing per ear (though doubling up with two pairs looks insanely chic). Choose from two finishes: gold or silver.

Best Pearl Earrings

Jennifer Behr Women's Iris Earring ($142)

The beauty of these stacked pearl earrings (aside from their obvious aesthetic appeal) is that they're incredibly versatile. Wear them with a cozy sweater this fall and winter, or pair them with a gown for that winter wedding on your calendar.

Best Button Earrings

Lele Sadoughi Women's Reflection Button Earrings ($145)

These earrings have all the charm of a vintage store find with their mesmerizing blue agate resin cabochon and gold-plated setting. The color is undeniably double take-worthy, and the oversize shape is the definition of elegance.

Best Beachy Necklace

Eliou Women's Arla Wrap Necklace ($175)

If you've got a vacation on the calendar or your vibe leans eclectic, laid-back, and DIY-inspired, it's time to add some Éliou to your collection. The brand's wrap necklaces are some of our faves. It comes in several iterations, but this spiral freshwater pearl pendant version is hard to beat.

Best Double Strand Necklace

Lizzie Fortunato Lamai Heart Necklace ($380)

Lizzie Fortunato jewelry is packed with personality, and this necklace is no exception. The playful double strand design features vibrant multicolor sapphire beads, a gold-plated paperclip chain, and a dangling amazonite heart with a faceted citrine gemstone for a touch of sparkle.

Best Bubble Necklace

Ulla Johnson Women's Bubble Coral Necklace ($450)

This Ulla Johnson bubble necklace is a one-of-a-kind piece you'll want to pass down to loved ones someday. It's handmade in Kenya from recycled brass and assembled in New York, featuring playful bubble-shaped vintage coral stones.

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
